DBLP:conf/icwsm/MejovaKM23.title: Authority without Care: Moral Values behind the Mask Mandate Response
DBLP:conf/icwsm/MejovaKM23.author:
Yelena Mejova and
Kyriaki Kalimeri and
Gianmarco De Francisci Morales
DBLP:conf/icwsm/MejovaKM23.paperMotivationText: Designing effective public health campaigns requires analysis of a population's underlying moral values
DBLP:conf/icwsm/MejovaKM23.paperContributionText: Combination of graph mining, natural language processing, topic modeling, content analysis, and time series analysis to characterize the responses to the mask mandate
DBLP:conf/icwsm/MejovaKM23.paperResultsText: Conservatives' moral values show an atypical dearth of in-group loyalty; both conservatives and liberals show decreased emphasis on care
